oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Issue of the Transport Ace, dated August 5, 1919
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Major Bernard Edwin Ragland (1894-1963) served in the Dentist Corps and was a member of the Medical Detachment of the 155 Inf. Regt., 39th Div. during World War I. The Transport Ace was the onboard daily newspaper of the U.S.S. Leviathan. Articles in this post-war edition are concerned with the United States' relations with other countries, such as peace and immigration. The newspaper also lists the number of soldiers, sailors, and civilians, including members of charitable organizations, on board.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
